text.more: Network is based on the last  16,979 tweets containing hashtag #1od5miliona posted until 18:18 on April 13. The edges exist between two users if one retweets another user's tweet. Nodes are colored based on community that they belong to: yellowish are pro-govt and blueish are anti-govt. The overall network has 5,903 nodes and 14,126 edges. Strong polarization visible. Anti-govt community is twice the size of pro-govt one. Opposition block took over in diffusion of information. The anti-govt community is the most diverse so far.
text.title: Anti-government protests in Serbia - #1od5miliona
